website_summaries.verdict: The cheapest way to begin playing your favorite Nintendo exclusives like Pokémon and Donkey Kong wherever you want. As entertaining as the 3DS – especially if you can live without the 3D effect. The addition of a fantastic Mario adventure is icing on the cake.
pros: Electric Blue 2” colored Nintendo 2DS with New Super Mario Bros. 2 pre-installed
cons: The 2DS does not include the engaging 3D visual effect or protective clamshell design of Nintendo’s 3DS handheld

customer_reviews.title: Came with wrong game pre-loaded
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so my boys could play Mario Bros. together, but when it arrived it had Mario Kart 7 pre-loaded instead of Mario Bros. as advertised. All arrived in working order, but we are a little disappointed the correct game did not come with the DS as we would have purchased a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: You know you want it ;)
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap alternative to get into the 3DS world without spending tons of cash. It already includes a game but I would rather it were a cart instead of digital. But well, times are like this now
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my sons 5th Birthday he is so excited to get it. Super fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: KatieR30

customer_reviews.title: You should get it!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it comes with a game . And I can use it for fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jordana Eisenstein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: A must have for all ages ! I really love that friends n family can play together in this handheld 2ds also best feature is that it doesn’t fold no hinges to get loose !! Overall I am extremely satisfied with my purchase as I’m already finding games from my childhood nostalgia
customer_reviews.author: mrshryan1215

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a good Christmas gift for my 7-year-old daughter. Cheap, durable and easy to play. Father & daughter both loved it. This is a good first Nintendo for trial and once kids get a hang of it, parents can upgrade to higher versions.
customer_reviews.author: A Tirk

customer_reviews.title: Worked well and did what it was supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This got so much use and was a big hit as a gift for a grandson. It worked well until a fateful fall from a table, but even then he continued to play with it with a broken screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Foster

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I order mine new..it looks new and everything works right.. but there something rattling inside and the b button is a little loose.. and maybe I'm worng but the charge port looks slightly bent ... over all it works ..
customer_reviews.author: 7jason7

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the advertised preloaded game. Was poorly packed and very dirty. Screen is scratched and has a couple dings and dents, not in "excellent, collectors" condition at all...
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: This was our second DS in 1 year that has broken. This one fell off my sons bed. Maybe 2 feet onto a rug and the inside screen cracked and went black. We won’t be buying anymore of these. Super disappointing, now all the games we bought were also a waste.
customer_reviews.author: amanda sorsen

customer_reviews.title: Son loves his 2ds
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves Nintendo/anything mario. He had the red/white version of 2ds prior to this but shoulder buttons broke on board when it fell off fridge. Only wish you didn't lose preloaded games while doing file transfer..
customer_reviews.author: KRedd

customer_reviews.title: My son is happy... so i'm happy...
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to the expensive ones. Your able to buy more games because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So fun and the pre installed Mario game is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Nourulislam

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo daughter loves her Nintendo! I love the preloaded MARIO game! Thank you so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Not what you really want
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Most games on the eShop are not buyable due to Nintendo locking the software to "New" systems. Not "New" as in never used, "New" as in updated hardware. Buy a "New 3ds/2ds" instead and save yourself the disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Elec Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect details on device.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it said it had Mario 2 pre installed but it does not. I should have went off of what ppl said by it not having the right game on it! Mine doesn’t even have a game preinstalled at all!! Super upsetting for my 6 year who wanted this for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn white

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT come with the pre-installed game as described !!! Very upsetting!!! my daughter was so excited!!!! smh you had one job... Was to send the correct product with installed game listed. You had the box correct but no Super Mario Bros 2. This is not what I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Colunga

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and with the game, stylus, and sd card. So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: bookishgirl74

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was quite happy with the 2DS. I had it delivered direct to his house. The package was placed on the porch as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Vaj

customer_reviews.title: Scratched bad!!
customer_reviews.text: Gamboy had very deep scratches in it. Description of product is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Burns

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These games were not in the original package and the game was not pre installed...if it wasn't so close to christmas I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth wilbanks

customer_reviews.title: Game system is great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: This item was a good buy , was a gift for two of my grandchildren who love it ! Works great
customer_reviews.author: Tina Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for the first few minutes then it froze when I tried to start up another game and it was unusable
customer_reviews.author: Redel

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: Solid item. Good price and fun games. Good for kids
customer_reviews.author: Onion_Layers

customer_reviews.title: Preloaded game
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to come with preload Mario but did not
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: no game
customer_reviews.text: did not come with Mario Bros big sad, like it said it would
customer_reviews.author: Gray Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Includes Stylus
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got this for me as a present and I live it so much! I had an original Nintendo ds and Dsi growing up with all the Mario games I could get. This device really is a step up from the old ones. I love that it’s still touch screen and can do what the other ones can do but for a cheaper price with the game i wanted included. Highly recommend getting a case to protect the screens if you’re buying this for kids/teens.
customer_reviews.author: Lexii

customer_reviews.title: Re
customer_reviews.text: What the hell is THIS? The picture shows this item in the manufacturer's package. What did I get? I got a Priority Mail box with the Nintendo 2DS inside, no box, wrapped once in bubble wrap, with the charger just floating around next to it. Really??? I thought I was buying a new product. I'm super pissed, this is supposed to be a Christnas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Nutmegger Yankee

customer_reviews.title: its awsome
customer_reviews.text: I love it it works good and it can play any game I no of
customer_reviews.author: Steffanie

product_meta.title: Nintendo 2DS - Electric Blue 2 with New Super Mario Bros. 2 (Game Pre-Installed) - 2DS
product_meta.description: The BEST of two worlds. The Nintendo 2DS system brings the power of two systems together into a single, affordable package. Play games-both Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3ds-in 2D. Connect with friends, other players, and wireless hotspots using the wireless streetpass and spotpass communication modes to unlock exclusive content for games and download other entertainment. Nintendo 2DS is a 2D system that plays Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3DS games in 2D only.
feature_bullets: The Nintendo 2DS system brings the power of 2 systems together into a single, affordable package; Play games both Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3ds in 2D
Connect with friends, other players, and wireless hotspots using the wireless StreetPass and SpotPass communication modes to unlock exclusive content for games and download other entertainment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars267 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
